mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Van Winkle, Peter G. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Van Winkle, Peter G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 5 1861. By Telegraph, from Parkersburg 5 1861. I will leave for Wheeling tomorrow. Harrison's letter was recd & attended to. PG Van Winkle 13w49 coll [page 2] P.G. Van Winkle July 5 1861.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Van Winkle, Peter G.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
